content: this is a free pdf pattern of a little whale a super easy beginner friendly and no-sew amigurumi project size 4x2cm materials - cotton yarn i used white and soft salmon - crochet hook 2 5mm - safety eyes 5mm - others synthetic stuffing stitch marker scissors yarn needle the final size of your amigurumi can vary depending on the used materials on how tight or loose is your crocheting the amount of stuffing the weight of your yarn etc
